title: Joshua and the blob
creator_credit: John Lange, Stephen Bosustow, Stephen Bosustow Productions and Joshua Films
brief_description: Deals with the effect of external influences on a person’s thoughts and behaviour by telling about a person who reacts in various ways to a creature he does not understand. Shows that as his knowledge increases, his behaviour is more effective and his reactions more positive. Animated.
creator_credit_for_label: John Lange, Stephen Bosustow, Stephen Bosustow Productions and Joshua Films
